title: ‘Student Loans Company sent £2,400 installment to the wrong person due to a typo’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I started as a fresher at Northumbria University this week. On Monday the first instalment of my student loan was due, but it didn’t arrive.

I asked some friends and a few said they hadn’t received theirs yet either. I was hoping that my £2,484 instalment would be there soon, but it never came.

I then realised that when I applied for the loan I had accidentally typed in the last digit of my sort code incorrectly. I contacted the Student Loans Company and my bank, NatWest, but they are both saying they still do not know if they can get the money back. Even...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
